event.title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
event.description:
Agenda:

6pm  Arrival and drinks

6.30pm  Presentations followed by networking and drinks

• Building the Unicorn: creating a Data Science Team - Rich Pugh, Mango Solutions

• Smashing the Racket: Detecting match-fixing in tennis via in-play betting irregularities - Tim Paulden, ATASS Sport

• Risk of NEET (Not in Employment, Education or Training) Indicator Refresh - John Steedman, North Somerset Council
